review: Visited the escape as a team building exercise with fellow managers. Loved it.... when do we get to go again?

review: This was a blast. Highly recommend doing this!!

room_title: Escape room "Hors D'oeuvres & Obituaries" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: Celebrated our youngest's 16th birthday! We got the antidote with 10 minutes to spare! Had a blast! Anxious to try the other scenarios! Great fun for all!

room_title: Escape room "Hors D'oeuvres & Obituaries" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: It was amazing, though very difficult with so many type A's in one room. Haha. 10/10 would try again.

room_title: Escape room "Hors D'oeuvres & Obituaries" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: Thanks! We had a really great time! The staff was really friendly and we had an all around great experience. We'll be back!

room_title: Escape room "Hors D'oeuvres & Obituaries" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: We needed a work team building (bringing together) exercise for our yearly retreat and this place fit the bill perfectly. Reserving the space was easy, we were greeted quickly and the games were a BLAST. For my first experience I couldn't have asked for anything else, perfection! Thank you for helping us come together after a long year. Highly recommend for work group, family or friends. The hour went by FAST and it was just a great time all around.
